rescale-refresh-spr.name: Rescale Loading Circle
rescale-refresh-spr.description: <cg>Rescales</c> the loading circle visible when loading Gauntlet Levels. <cy>Use the arrows for better accuracy</c>!

enable-background-particles.name: Background Particles
enable-background-particles.description:
Enables the <cg>background particles</c> added by <cc>**Better Gauntlets**</c>.

You'll need to <cj>reload</c> the layer to see changes (exit and re-enter the Gauntlet Screen(s)).

islands-float.name: Islands Hover
islands-float.description: Gauntlet Islands will have a <cg>hovering animation</c>.

vault-tooltip.name: Toggle Vault Tooltip
vault-tooltip.description:
<cg>Toggles</c> the tooltip for the Gauntlet's Vault Levels.

Must have <cy>Gauntlet Level Vault</c> by <cj>Jacob375</c> installed.

toggle-paths.name: Enable Paths
toggle-paths.description: <cg>Toggles</c> the paths in between Gauntlet Levels.

enable-path-edits.name: Path Color Editing
enable-path-edits.description: Enables the <cg>editing</c> of the Gauntlet Paths' <cy>color values</c>.

path-blending.name: Path Blending
path-blending.description: Sets the <cg>blending</c> of the path dots in between the Gauntlet Levels.
